nav.title: Our Forests tomorrow
nav.search: search for a species name, description...

speciesPage.naturallyPresent: {{species}} is naturally present in {{regions}} and <3>{{numRegions}} more regions</3>.
speciesPage.willDisappear: {{species}} is likely to disappear from {{regions}} and <3>{{numRegions}} more regions</3>.
speciesPage.couldThrive: However, by 2095 it could thrive in {{regions}} and <3>{{numRegions}} more regions</3>.

mapLegend.hereExplanation: In the currently visible map area
mapLegend.current: This is the current distribution of {{species}} (chorology)
mapLegend.overwhelminglySuitable: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is likely to become suitable {{pctSuitable}}
mapLegend.mostlyDecolonizedSomewhatSuitable: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is likely to disappear {{pctDecolonized}}, while in some areas it might become suitable {{pctSuitable}}
mapLegend.mostlyDecolonizedSomewhatStable: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is likely to disappear {{pctDecolonized}}, while in some areas it is stable {{pctStable}}
mapLegend.mostlySuitableSomewhatDecolonized: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is likely to become suitable {{pctSuitable}}, while in some areas it might disappear {{pctDecolonized}}
mapLegend.mostlySuitableSomewhatStable: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is likely to become suitable {{pctSuitable}}, while in some areas it is stable {{pctStable}}
mapLegend.mostlyStableSomewhatDecolonized: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is stable {{pctStable}}, but in some areas it might disappear {{pctDecolonized}}
mapLegend.mostlyStableSomewhatSuitable: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is stable {{pctStable}}, and in some areas it might become suitable {{pctSuitable}}
mapLegend.bothDecolonizedAndSuitable: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is somewhat equally likely to disappear {{pctDecolonized}} and likely to become suitable {{pctSuitable}}
mapLegend.bothStableAndSuitable: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is somewhat equally stable {{pctStable}} and likely to become suitable {{pctSuitable}}
mapLegend.bothDecolonizedAndStable: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is somewhat equally stable {{pctStable}} and likely to disappear {{pctDecolonized}}
mapLegend.equal: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>,  {{species}} is somewhat equally stable {{pctStable}}, likely to disappear {{pctDecolonized}}, and likely to become suitable {{pctSuitable}}
mapLegend.noData: <0>{{area}}</0>, by <2>{{year}}</2>, {{species}} is absent and not suitable in this area
